title: [Large-Scale] Digital Game-Based Foundational Accounting Principles Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational financial management knowledge and understanding of educational methodologies
context.additional_context: A course designed for pre-service and in-service teachers to systematically acquire accounting principles via gamified content, providing a self-directed learning environment using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain 80% or more of fundamental accounting terms (debit/credit, journal entries, financial statements, etc.)
Learners can replicate the accounting cycle step-by-step through digital game-based simulations
Learners can design accounting learning modules applicable to real educational settings through team project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
